name: Roll For Damage 🎲
description:
⚠ Online leaderboard only available in local copies ⚠

Fight for your life as a DND paladin fighting off bad rolls, but beware, the dice like to fight back too, and they pack quite the punch! Aim your mouse in the direction you want to shoot and click. WASD to move. Survive as long as you can

⚠ FOR BETTER PERFORMANCE, AND ACCESS TO THE LEADERBOARD, PLAY THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION ⚠

CONTROLS

MOVE: WASD
SHOOT: LEFT MOUSE

OBJECTIVE

Killing enemies increases your score - kill as many as possible without dying in the process.


Creators:
ART ASSETS: @Nicolas_Gatien
CODE: @J_Ham04
SFX: @J_Ham04
MUSIC: Boss Fight

Tools:
GAME ENGINE: Unity
ART ASSETS: Aseprite
SFX: sfxr
